description: Award-winning trekking trousers in stretch fabric and G-1000 Eco, now updated for even better performance, comfort and durability. The trousers have classic, large pockets, generous ventilation zippers and openings for kneepads (an accessory). A well-fitting, durable classic pair of trousers for maximum freedom of movement in the mountains.
name: Fjallraven Keb Trousers, Short - Mens
